TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

Docs.summary: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>. Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property. For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> contains standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>.
To get the control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> belongs to, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
## Examples The following code example adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of five controls: four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when the change is complete.
## Examples The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> instance, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method to add the instance to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event to occur.
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method to add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
[!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection.Add1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.

-or-

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property is used in cases where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> without a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> specified is added to the collection. remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example removes a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>. The example gets the required <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A> property, and removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A> method.
